TopicTitle: Toggle maneuver info in map mode

Articles.Content:
Not sure if this has already been suggested. Can't seem to find a reference in my rudimentary search...

Can we please have a key press toggle in map mode to dynamically hide/reveal maneuver node info.

When burning for an inclination change or encounter it would be nice to be able to see the progress without planned trajectory clutter.

Thanks for listening ;-)

Edited January 13, 2015 by Wallygator
